data.name: Incoming Funds
data.description: Funds recieved for use on the activity, which can be from an external or internal source.

data.name: Commitment
data.description: A firm, written obligation from a donor or provider to provide a specified amount of funds, under particular terms and conditions, for specific purposes, for the benefit of the recipient.

data.name: Disbursement
data.description: Outgoing funds that are placed at the disposal of a recipient government or organisation, or funds transferred between two separately reported activities.Under IATI traceability standards the recipient of a disbursement should also be required to report their activities to IATI.

data.name: Expenditure
data.description: Outgoing funds that are spent on goods and services for the activity. The recipients of expenditures fall outside of IATI traceability standards.

data.name: Interest Repayment
data.description: The actual amount of interest paid on a loan or line of credit, including fees.

data.name: Loan Repayment
data.description: The actual amount of principal (amortisation) repaid, including any arrears.

data.name: Reimbursement
data.description: A type of disbursement that covers funds that have already been spent by the recipient, as agreed in the terms of the grant or loan

data.name: Purchase of Equity
data.description: Outgoing funds that are used to purchase equity in a business

data.name: Sale of Equity
data.description: Incoming funds from the sale of equity.

data.name: Credit Guarantee
data.description: A commitment made by a funding organisation to underwrite a loan or line of credit entered into by a third party.

data.name: Incoming Commitment
data.description: A firm, written obligation from a donor or provider to provide a specified amount of funds, under particular terms and conditions, reported by a recipient for this activity.
